attributes.action: Stop the private sale of fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.rospa.com/home-safety/advice/fireworks-safety/injuries-gb-2005/

http://www.fireworks-forum.org.uk/threads/5-facts-about-fireworks.16293/

Family back garden parties are the most dangerous.
attributes.background: Fireworks are dangerous and have no need to be sold privately. I love firework shows so feel that only organised and licensed shows/events can buy fireworks. This would stop children getting injured and help the stress put on pets weeks running up to Nov 5th.
